name: Blooming Dreams
description: As soon as Flower Sprite Fairy Tale hit the shelves, it topped the children's book charts. Many wondered how the once-unknown author could have crafted such a masterpiece after a year-long silence. The author replied, 'For me, this story holds much more than just a fairy tale.'
label: Fairy
Fantasy

name: Blossoming Stars
description: How long does it take to go from nobody to somebody? If a small star is not bright enough to illuminate the night sky, what about gathering thousands of them and weaving them into a splendid Milky Way?
label: Pastoral
Romance

name: Flutter Storm
description: That wandering island will never be found again. Perhaps the goddess there still relishes the war moments in the expanse of eternity. In that realm, a butterfly flutters, striving to reach the distant human world, stirring a hurricane in someone's heart.
label: Romance
Ballroom

name: Dance Till Dawn
description: Soar into the dazzling sky and dance alongside the fireworks! Leave behind yesterday's sorrows, for tonight, joy will be in the spotlight. Unwavering courage will cast out the darkness and the future will blossom in radiant sunlight.
label: Fantasy
Cute

name: Verdant Melodies
description: Wandering along Silken Lake, a gentlle breeze stirs, setting the lake's surface aglow with shimmering light. She gathers the scattered flowers and weave them, one by one, into a tapestry of romance, adorning the vibrant scenes along the picnic path with fresh, radiant blossoms.
label: Pastoral

name: Whispers of Bliss
description: On her tiny canvas, she captured a vibrant flower field, a basket of fruit, and a grace girl nearby. With bold strokes, the girl's figure seemed ready to step out of the painting.
label: Cute

name: Wishful Aurosa
description: Once, a race was awakened by a wish. Now, the miracles of wishes continue, illuminating lives just as the dormant fairies awaken amid the bloom of the Aurosa.
label: Formal
Retro

name: Paper Wings
description: Reach the 140 Deep Echoes pull milestone on the limited-time Celestial Wishes Banner.
label: none

name: Carnival Ode
description: In Chloe's diary, there's a line that reads, 'There should be an ode, dedicated to memory, to life, to home, and to the simple beauties around us.'
label: Fashion
